name: Steady State Cardio
description: Developing aerobic endurance through sustained, moderate-intensity cardiovascular exercise.

cards.title: Long-Distance Running for Aerobic Endurance
cards.description: Building stamina through extended running sessions at a steady pace.
bulletpoints: Maintain a consistent pace to enhance cardiovascular efficiency
Monitor heart rate zones to optimize fat burning and endurance
Increase mileage gradually to avoid overtraining and injuries

cards.title: Low-Impact Cardio for Sustainable Training
cards.description: Using alternative aerobic exercises to reduce joint strain while maintaining endurance.
bulletpoints: Engage in brisk walking, elliptical training, or swimming for low-impact endurance
Maintain a steady heart rate within the aerobic training zone
Gradually increase session duration to build long-term stamina
